programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: More than money makes the crime world go round. You won‚Äôt believe the odd array of goods that have been stolen over the years -- and the motivations behind the thefts.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.desc: Ted wants to live to 100 with his beloved wife beside him. But his oral health threatens his future. Kristy‚Äôs a FIXT staffer desperate to smile big on her wedding day. Will love help them face their fears?

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.desc: Master bartender Kate Gerwin visits Kansas City to talk whiskey, taste the nonalcoholic future at an innovative new bar, experience jazz at the Mutual Musicians Foundation, and learn all about Prohibition in the city that ignored it best.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Watch Rob howl like a wolf, chill out with African penguins and go horseback riding in this episode celebrating the natural world.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: 23-year-old cancer survivor Elizabeth is looking to find the one. She puts three blind dates to the test. Will love take a sharp turn for Sean, will she roll into a rhythm on skates with Cody or swing for the fences with Pat?

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Glenda Macatangay has conquered her career and being a single mom to four kids. But when it comes to being comfortable in the outdoors, she isn‚Äôt as confident. Kinga meets up with Glenda in Sacramento, CA to introduce her to the wonders of the wilderness.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: From an officer whose historic service is finally recognized, to a literary pioneer discovered right next door, every place has a hidden history. These are the unsung heroes, uncovered places, and untold connections in communities across this country.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Three-year-old Kamille McKinney, affectionately known as "Cupcake," is abducted while playing outside a relative's Birmingham home. The ensuing search unifies the city, as residents pray she will be found alive.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: In 1977, people across Pittsburgh live in fear as a string of brutal killings sends detectives on a chase to catch the shotgun slayer. He invades homes and senselessly attacks with a shotgun, knives and hammers in the dead of night.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Veteran NYC Chef Ten Vong squares up against Jimmy's Famous Seafood rep Charlie Wickboldt. Watch these chefs transform their colorful careers into even more colorful plates. Who will find the tomato trophy at the end of the rainbow?

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Cyber-burglars, a dangerous mix of con artist and geek, wreak havoc on the technologically vulnerable. Our experts offer tips to spot such high-tech trickery before it's too late.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Sometimes the bad guys are busted by regular people! These stories showcase good Samaritans stopping suspects in their tracks.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: From fencing, to ninja warrior training, to boxing and Tai Chi, Rob discovers an inner strength he never knew he had‚Ä¶while getting kicked in the keister.

programme.title: Only In
programme.desc: Where can you discover an iconic local artist, award-winning tortillas and classic prairie-inspired jewelry? The same place where Fountain Day festivities come alive and underground adventures await.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: In this season's finale, Frank Nicotero finds a couple of good sports in New Orleans and Cincinnati. Watch as he revisits the most absurd moments from the first two seasons.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.desc: Fancy feasting, a walking city tour and a selfie paradise on two cheap dates in New Orleans.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: All across this country, people are stepping up to help their communities in big and small ways. From nurses, veterans and firefighters, to teachers, neighbors, and strangers, every community has a hero.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.desc: KISS-FM radio host, Alley Faith joins Greg to explore places that put Milwaukee on the map. They visit the Harley Davidson Museum, a unique cheese creamery and ring the bell with Mayor Cavalier Johnson atop what was once the world's tallest building.

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.desc: Angel gears up for a day of nonstop action with adrenaline-junkie and restaurateur, Steve Chu. They get their hearts pumping with crazy-fast jet skis, hardcore jiu jitsu training, a sky-high ropes course and an epic paintball showdown.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: In this battle, it's a clash of comfort food. Chef Pom Moongauklang of Pom Pom‚Äôs Sandwicheria & Tea House in The Milk District takes on Chef Nikki Akins of Nikki‚Äôs Place in the Parramore District. It‚Äôs Catfish versus Mackerel on Blind Kitchen.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Ivan Gomez is on a weight loss journey, but it‚Äôs one that‚Äôs been limited to exercising in his home. Kinga meets Ivan in Stockton, CA to show him how the outdoors can be a personal gym for body, mind and spirit.

programme.title: Lowrider Legacy
programme.desc: Lowrider Legacy follows celebrated lowrider families, scholars, and activists and documents the history of resistance on wheels that has defined lowrider culture.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Justin tests his mettle to see if he can compete in the Ironman World Championship. With only seven months to train and no prior experience, can Justin pull off this amazing fitness feat?

programme.title: Too Late To Say Sorry
programme.desc: A triple homicide in small town Maine rocks a community and destroys a family. It doesn't take police long to piece together the elements of the crime, and its ruthless cover-up, which point back to a perpetrator close to home.

programme.title: Operation Stolen Bonds: Duping Wise Guy Robbers
programme.desc: Ernie Lijoi is an agent for the Quincy, MA police department, working in tandem with FBI and DEA. An informant tips him off that a crew of bank robbers are looking to sell $800,000 in stolen bonds. Lijoi goes undercover and pretends to want to buy the bonds, while he builds a case against the robbers. He meets the bank robbers in a courtroom to broker the deal and sets a trap to take everyone involved down - including the informant.

The detective plays it perfectly but not before he has to dodge loaded Uzi's and lie detector tests to prove his loyalty to the dealer.

programme.title: Operation Whiskey 12: Undercover Attack
programme.desc: Nate Hutchinson is part of an undercover team in Ogden, UT while working for the Weber County Sheriff's Department. After years of undercover operations involving small time drug dealing, the team pays a call to an illegal pot grower. A seemingly routine call explodes when the grower ambushes and shoots five undercover agents, killing one. Hutchinson exhibits unbelievable acts of bravery to save his fellow officers, and miraculously survives being shot 5 times. He returns to the force and the undercover team, driven to have the last word on the cowardly attacker.
